Articles.Content:
So I think it would be a great idea to create modpacks so people who don't have a clue on how to install mods or if some mods are tricky to install to help people install them.

P.S I'm requesting this because I'm not too good at installing mods but i beliveive it would help alot of other people.
Here is the most recent thread on this topic.
And really, I don't see what mod packs are going to do but add a problem.
